title: ALL SOLD - Group of 8 T207 available, discounts for larger purchases

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD - Group of 8 T207 available, discounts for larger purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the following T207 Recruit cards available for purchase. Shipping will be $3.00. Accepting Paypal only. 

Looking to sell these quickly, so I am offering the following discounts for larger purchases: Buy 2 or more cards, free shipping, 4 or more cards, 10% off, all 8 cards, 15% off.  Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely in a padded envelope.

Brian


Robert Coulson  $17
John Ferry  $14 (trimmed)
Elmer Knetzer - tougher Recruit  $29 (scuffing on back)
Harry McIntire  $14 (paper loss front)
William Scanlon  $16
German Schaefer  $13 (paper loss front)

Brian
